item.title: Walmart is selling a $190 smartwatch for $25 that's 'dependable and stylish'
item.description: "The touchscreen responds quickly, and the menus are logically organized."

item.title: Coreweave stock analyst makes huge change to price target
item.description: The new price tag shakes things up.

item.title: 40-year-old Italian restaurant brand closing forever next month
item.description: Born in Japan and a fan favorite in the U.S., this Italian restaurant will close its doors forever after four decades.

item.title: Walmart is selling a $130 gaming chair for $80 that's 'sturdy and comfortable'
item.description: "I can sit in this chair for multiple hours in comfort without any chair fatigue."

item.title: Airline to cancel all West Coast flights earlier, offers customers refunds
item.description: A spokesperson confirmed that service would be pulled in October instead of December.
